body_html:
Interesting!!! I'm sorry I have no idea about the task you're working on.
I'm applying your patch to the tf.contrib.rnn.LayerNormBasicLSTMCell where they're applying the layer_norm function. Before I noticed that applying the current code, the training time was too slow.
Have a look at this issue
I have also to notice that I combined your modification with this interesting pull request .
I'm still training my model and I hope with these two patches I can achieve layerNorm faster and more accurate.
thank you

body:
Interesting!!! I'm sorry I have no idea about the task you're working on.
I'm applying your patch to the  tf.contrib.rnn.LayerNormBasicLSTMCell where they're applying the layer_norm function. Before I noticed that applying the current code, the training time was too slow. 
Have a look at [this issue](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/21929)
I have also to notice that I combined your modification with this interesting [pull request ](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/15861).
I'm still training my model and I hope with these two patches I can achieve layerNorm faster and more accurate. 
thank you
